*Teachers will be available from 8AM-3PM Monday through Friday to answer questions. Teachers can be reached on their email (first_name.last_name@rochelleisd.net), through Remind, Dojo, or phone. If families have questions on content, assignments, or grades please reach out to the appropriate teacher.*
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

br.span: It's official! The Rochelle ISD Board of Trustees approved the 2020-2021 school calendar. With this calendar, Rochelle ISD joins a short list of schools in Texas that operate on a 4-day school week. A copy of our approved calendar is below. An application packet for next year for all of our Future Hornets will be made available soon.
A printable copy of the 2019-2020 Rochelle ISD calendar can be found at
